resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103296</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103296</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202597</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Proof Puzzles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beweis-Puzzlespiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puzzles de Preuve</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enigmas Da Prova</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Puzzle Della Prova</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γρίφοι απόδειξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rompecabezas De la Prueba</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will work in small groups to put geometric proofs that have been cut apart in the correct order. They will organize statements with the correct reason. A recorder in the group will write the finished product for the group to turn in to the teacher.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer arbeiten in den kleinen Gruppen, um
geometrische Beweise zu setzen, die auseinander in die korrekte 
Ordnung geschnitten worden sind. Sie organisieren Anweisungen 
mit dem korrekten Grund. Ein Schreiber in der Gruppe schreibt 
dem Lehrer das Fertigprodukt für die Gruppe zur Umdrehung innen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants travailleront dans de petits 
groupes pour mettre les preuves géométriques qui ont été 
découpées dans la commande correcte. Ils organiseront des 
rapports avec la raison correcte. Un enregistreur dans le groupe
écrira le produit fini pour le groupe au tour dedans au professeur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes trabalharão em grupos pequenos para
pôr as provas geométricas que foram cortadas distante na ordem 
correta. Organizarão indicações com a razão correta. 
Um registrador no grupo escreverá o produto terminado para o 
grupo à volta dentro ao professor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi lavoreranno nei piccoli gruppi per 
mettere le prove geometriche che sono state tagliate a parte 
nell'ordine corretto. Organizzeranno le istruzione con il motivo
corretto. Un registratore nel gruppo scriverà il prodotto 
finito per il gruppo alla girata dentro all'insegnante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εργαστούν στις μικρές ομάδες για να 
βάλουν τις γεωμετρικές αποδείξεις που έχουν κοπεί χώρια στη 
σωστή κατάταξη. Θα οργανώσουν τις δηλώσεις με το σωστό 
λόγο. Ένα όργανο καταγραφής στην ομάδα θα γράψει το 
ολοκληρωμένο προϊόν για την ομάδα στη στροφή μέσα στο δάσκαλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes trabajarán en grupos pequeños 
para poner las pruebas geométricas que se han cortado aparte en la 
orden correcta. Ordenarán declaraciones con la razón correcta.
Un registrador en el grupo escribirá el producto acabado para 
el grupo a la vuelta adentro al profesor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ANN MEWBORN
FN:ANN MEWBORN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202597</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103296</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/proof-puzzles</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
